Detailed Description

Browser-Dection Class.

The Browser class is automatically initialized as DynAPI.browser and a global "is" Browser object. The Browser Class allows you to test for the client's browser type.

Example Usage: 

 if (is.ns) { }
 else if (is.ie) { }
 else if (is.opera { }

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Browser::Browser ( )
 

Initializes all properties of the Browser class.

Note:
This class is intialized globally as "is" and "DynAPI.browser".

Member Data Documentation

string Browser::b [private]
 

Stores the browser name.

boolean Browser::dom
 

True if the browser supports the dom.

boolean Browser::ie
 

Boolean value for Internet Explorer.

Boolean value for Internet Explorer 4.

Boolean value for Internet Explorer 5.

boolean Browser::ie55
 

Boolean value for Internet Explorer 5.5.

boolean Browser::ns
 

Boolean value for Netscape.

boolean Browser::ns4
 

Boolean value for Netscape 4.

boolean Browser::ns5
 

Boolean value for Netscape 6.

boolean Browser::opera
 

Boolean value for Opera.

string Browser::platform
 

Possible values are: "win32", "mac", and "other".

string Browser::ua [private]
 

Stores the user-agent string.

int Browser::v [private]
 

Stores the top-level browser number as integer.

string Browser::version [private]
 

Stores the browser version as a string.
